entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
